author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-1737 : Add state management for resources

author: clement
msg: Fix FELIX-2581 White Board Pattern onActivate called before @Validate
The handler must wait until the instance is started before opening the tracker.

author: hiranya
msg: * Updated the equal and match evaluator factories to support SOAPEnvelope text retriever and the property text retriever (SYNAPSE-684)
* Refactored the SourceTextRetriever interface and the implementations
* Unified the configuration model for all types of text processing evaluators (now exclusively using the source attribute - this will keep the configuration language simple and clean)
